20110101001918.000|20110101001920.000|TR0|
20110101001920.000|20110101001922.000|TR0|HENRY:  Now, Rich, it looked like the 
20110101001922.000|20110101001924.000|TR0|president was backpedaling. The White 
20110101001924.000|20110101001926.000|TR0|House said, no, he was not backpedaling.  
20110101001926.000|20110101001928.000|TR0|And it's interesting is that the tension 
20110101001928.000|20110101001930.000|TR0|inside the White House, were sort of -- 
20110101001930.000|20110101001932.000|TR0|the faction of sort of Rahm Emanuel, and
